text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump gave billions to big businesses/corporations when COVID-19 hit us. He gave taxpayers earning less than $99K with $1,200-$2,400 only. When Democrats wanted another stimulus package for the middle class, Trump and republicans refused. Clearly, he doesn’t care!
